Package tan.jerry.process_future_movement.controller

Class ProcessFutureMovementController

java.lang.Object
tan.jerry.process_future_movement.controller.ProcessFutureMovementController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api") public class ProcessFutureMovementController extends Object
REST controller for handling requests related to processing future movements. Provides endpoints for accessing the daily summary report.

  • Method Details

    • getDailySummaryReport

      @GetMapping("/get_daily_summary_report") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getDailySummaryReport(@RequestHeader(value="Accept",defaultValue="application/json") String acceptHeader)
      Handles GET requests to the /api/get_daily_summary_report endpoint. This endpoint returns a daily summary report as a map of client-product combinations and their total transaction amounts. It can return the data either in JSON format or as a downloadable CSV file, depending on the client's request. Clients can specify the desired format through the "Accept" header in the HTTP request: - To receive JSON: "Accept: application/json" - To download as CSV: "Accept: text/csv"
      Parameters:
      acceptHeader - The Accept header from the HTTP request, specifying the desired response format.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing the report data in the requested format.
